properties.name: Arsenal Center for the Arts
properties.description: Posted by Anonymous 321 Arsenal St., Watertown, MA, United StatesThis is the place to create and experience the arts! Home of Watertown Children\'s Theatre, New Rep and Improv Jones, also come to our Chamber Music Series! See visual art in our galleries, or take a class in drawing, painting or clay! Programs for adults and children. Visit www.arsenalarts.org

properties.name: Charles River Playground
properties.description: Posted by Anonymous  165 Irving Street, Watertown, MAA proper playground with swings and other play equipment. Also can see some of the local fauna and flora along the river.

properties.name: Filipello Park
properties.description: Posted by AnonymousFilipello Park is a large and newly renovated park in the East End. To find out more about the playground, fields, and water park, see H2oKids: Filipello Park.

properties.name: Gore Place
properties.description: Posted by Lisawilliams52 Gore St., Waltham, MA, United StatesGore Place: The early 18oos estate of Massachusetts Governor Christopher Gore includes a small farm with sheep, goats and poultry. The elegantly furnished mansion has been called “the Monticello of the North” and architectural historians consider it to be the most significant Federal period mansion in New England.
